ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8201_2001_01_10: Hey there! How are you doing?
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
I’m here to listen if you’re ever troubled by
anything, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
I feel very relaxed when I’m with you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8201_2101_01_10: Here, you should have this item.
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8201_2101_02_10: No need to thank me—and don’t hesitate to use it!
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
There’s something I wanted to give you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
My Pokémon found it, but I figured you’d use
it well!
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
I was waiting for you! I’d love for you to
have this.
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
I’d be thrilled if it could help you grow,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I have a ton of things I wanted to chat with
you about!
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8201_2302_01_10: A present for me? Thank you very much!
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
What a wonderful gift! Thank you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
I can tell that you have a warm heart. I’ll
definitely return the favor one day!
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
Well, that was time well spent. Let’s catch up
again soon!
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
When I talk to you, I realize many things that I
normally wouldn’t on my own.
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
I just really enjoy talking to you—I couldn’t put it
any better!
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
When I look outside the lodge, sometimes I see
some Pokémon come by.
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
They must belong to other Trainers since there
aren’t any wild Pokémon on Pasio...
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
Anyway, I can’t help but smile when I see them
happily interact with one another.
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8002_0701_01_10: I’m very impressed by your growth!
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8002_0701_02_10: One day you might catch up to me...
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
So I look forward to the day I get to battle an
even stronger version of you in the
Pokémon League!
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
Constantly being seen by others allows me to
stay focused.
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
So it’s not always a bad thing to have people’s
attention on you.
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
When I’m with you, though, I feel like I can relax
a bit.
ch0111_00_wataru_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
You’ve become so reliable. I know I can always
count on you!
